name: Forklift Mania
description:
Have you one time conceived to drive a forklift ? In this forklift puzzle you will have to drive this engine as your best to pick up a package to a truck. But watch out, don't break it.

This game is an early protype made in 3 days for The Completion Jam.

This game and all of the assets have been made by myself.

Use Arrows to drive

S to use your breaks

Q to grab a package

E to drop it off
